alert.note: Alert for Banks; Barrow; Clarke; Gwinnett; Jackson; Madison; Oconee (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 02 at 4:59AM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Oconee, Barrow, east central Gwinnett, southeastern Banks, northern Clarke, Jackson and Madison Counties through 530 AM EST... At 457 AM EST, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Homer to Hog Mountain, and moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Lawrenceville, Winder, Jefferson, Commerce, Homer, Danielsville, Athens, Braselton, Auburn, Dacula, Statham, Maysville, Arcade, Nicholson, Hoschton, Bogart, Bethlehem, Colbert, Pendergrass and Ila. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.

area.areaDesc: Banks; Barrow; Clarke; Gwinnett; Jackson; Madison; Oconee
